60 Armor
60 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste

pass.description: Increase your [{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}] by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a '''maximum''' of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

16% Heal and Shield Power
50 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

act.name: Purify
act.description: Remove all [{tip|crowd control}} debuffs (except {{tip|Airborne}}, {{tip|Blind}}, {{tip|Disarm}}, {{tip|Ground}}, {{tip|Nearsight}}, and {{tip|Suppression}}) from yourself or the target allied champion and {{tip|heal}} the target for {{pp|100 to 180|type:target's level}].

3330.name: Scarecrow Effigy
3330.description:
Active - Trinket: Places an effigy that appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores up to a maximum of 2 charges.

Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.

act.name: Trinket
act.description: Consume a charge to place a visible [{tip|Effigy}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area for {{pp|130 to 300}} seconds. The effigy visually appears exactly as {{ci|Fiddlesticks}} does to enemies while idle. Enemy champions that approach an effigy while having {{tip|sight}] of it will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will deal 1 damage to itself.

3340.name: Stealth Ward

act.name: Trinket
act.description: Consume a charge to place an invisible [{tip|Totem Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area for {{pp|90 to 120|type:average of all champion levels}] seconds.

act.description: Summons a [{tip|Sweeper Drone}} that escorts you for the next 10 seconds, detecting nearby enemies that are not {{tip|sight|visible}].

Glimpse of the Void: Grants Empowered.
3513.limit: The '''Eye of the Herald''' will be removed from the inventory if not used within 240 seconds.

pass.name: Glimpse of the Void

act.description: After a [{fd|3.5}}-second [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] and a 3-second {{tip|channel}] afterwards from the user and the target allied champion, both become bound allies. Becoming {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per {{tip|cast instance}] can only grant 1 stack of ''Steadfast'' every 1 second.
